1.<%sM_ITEM>の書を 捨てて|<%sM_GET_ITEM>の書を 手に入れ: I'll get rid of the <%sM_ITEM> book and get|the <%sM_GET_ITEM> book... Are you sure you|want to do this?<yesno2><close>

2.スキルノートが いっぱいで|これ以上 手に入れることが できません。|どのスキル: My skill notebooks are full and I can't get|any more... Which skill notes do you want to|get rid of?<break>

6.手に入れなかった スキルノートは|この場で 消えてしまいます。|本当に よろしい: Any skill notes you didn't get will disappear|right here... Are you sure you want to do|this?<yesno2><close>

9.この スキルノートを 手に入れますか？|<yesno><close>: Would you like to get your hands on this|skill notebook?<yesno><close>

10.すでに <%sM_CATEGORY>のノートを|覚えているので このスキルとは|: I've already memorized the <%sM_CATEGORY>|note, so I can replace it with this skill...<bw_break>

11.同じ系統のスキルは ひとつしか|覚えることが できません。|忘れるスキルを 選ん: You can only learn one skill in the same|line. Choose a skill you'd like to forget.<break>

13.忘れるスキルを 選んでください。|<break>: Pick a skill you'd like to forget.<break>

14.書かれているスキルが|すべて同じスキルノートを すでに もっていた！|<br>|: I already had a skill notebook with all the|same skills written in it!<pc> Shut up and take your skill notes.<end>

15.この スキルノートを 持っていきますか？|<yesno><close>: Would you like to take these skill notes with|you?<yesno><close>

16.<%sM_CATEGORY>のノートは|すでに おぼえています。|おなじ系統のス: I've already memorized the notes for|<%sM_CATEGORY>... You can replace it with a|skill from the same family...<break>

17.習得中の スキルノートは|捨てる事が できません。|他のスキルノートを 選んでく: You can't throw away the skill notes you're|learning. You can choose a different skill|note...<bw_break>

18.<color_yellow>|すでに クルクルポシェットへ送った|スキルノートが: <color_yellow>I've already sent them to Kurukuru Pochette,|but she's full of skill notes. Let's go get|our reward!<end>
